abstract: BEA Systems is under the gun to get its financial restatements in order before its largest shareholder, Carl C. Icahn, calls an annual shareholders meeting.
lead_paragraph: BEA Systems is under the gun to get its financial restatements in order before its largest shareholder, Carl C. Icahn, calls an annual shareholders meeting.

headline.main: As Icahn Looms, BEA In Race to Restate
